actions.explanation: For the city Metroville, New Building Standards were prioritized because they directly address a major source of emissions in the urban building sector. Its design supports cost-effective improvements while mitigating climate-related risks. Overall, it aligns strongly with the city’s sustainability goals and urban planning strategies.
